item.title: Meister Eckhart Quotes
item.description: Though I'm not religious, I love the apophatic tradition and especially love reading Eckhart's works. Blessed are those who preach of the ineffable. Some of my favourite Meister Eckhart quotes: One must not always think so much about what one should do, but rather what one should be. Our works do not ennoble us; but we must ennoble our works. Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
